Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Is there a way to speed up the ad review process? My ads have been in review for a long time

Hi Sean, the ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. If your ads have been in review for longer than that, it might be a good idea to check if there are any issues with your ad content. You can refer to our guidelines and policies to ensure everything is in order. Here's a helpful article on troubleshooting common ad creation issues: [How to create your first ad](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17618196971149-How-to-create-your-first-ad). If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
Connecting you to a live agent. Please hold.

If you would like to proceed with verification and request a review of this decision, please provide the following details to adsupport@newsbreak.com:

Full company address
